business_definition: Group item containing complete transaction record structure with a record length of 350 bytes
Transaction type code indicating the category or classification of the transaction (PIC X(02))
Transaction category code for further classification of transaction types (PIC 9(04))
Source system or channel from which the transaction originated (PIC X(10))
Detailed description of the transaction providing additional context and information (PIC X(100))
Transaction amount in dollars and cents, signed numeric value (PIC S9(09)V99)
Unique numeric identifier for the merchant where the transaction occurred (PIC 9(09))
Name of the merchant or business establishment where the transaction took place (PIC X(50))
City location of the merchant where the transaction was processed (PIC X(50))
Postal zip code of the merchant location (PIC X(10))
Credit or debit card number used for the transaction (PIC X(16))
Original timestamp when the transaction was initiated or created (PIC X(26))
Processing timestamp when the transaction was processed by the system (PIC X(26))
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
